reviewText: I was looking in the section where it showed other things available, and I didn't notice that it wasn't a book, like the rest of the craft books.  I don't even have a VHS machine anymore :-(  This is not a 2 star rating for the content, just that I can't use the VHS tape.
I though this would have more information and instruction.  Pretty good for beginners.  I gave it to my kids and they like it.
Donna Dewberry provides ecellent instructions on "how to" paint on glass and ceramics. Great for beginners and anyone wanting to learn more about one stroke painting.
